mutants.code:
def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X + Y // 2

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X * (Y // 2)

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X - Y / 2

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X - Y * 2

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X - Y // 3

    """

    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.

def calculate_total_watch_time(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the total time Chef spends watching the movie.

    Parameters:
    X (int): Total duration of the movie in minutes.
    Y (int): Duration of the first part of the movie watched at twice the speed.

    Returns:
    int: Total time Chef spends watching the movie.
    """
    return X - Y // -2
